info.description:
API definition for UKCore based on CareConnect API

 | FHIR Implementation Guide | Version |
 |-----|-----|
 |[ukcore.release1.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/hl7fhirukcorer4release1/home)||

tags.name: Appointment
tags.description:
A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s).

 Profile (constraints): [England-Appointment](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/England-Appointment.guide.md)

tags.name: Encounter
tags.description:
An interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient.

 Profile (constraints): [UKCore-Encounter](https://simplifier.net/guide/HL7FHIRUKCoreR4Release1/Home/ProfilesandExtensions/ProfileUKCore-Encounter)

 Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Encounter resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve encounter information.

 This profile allows exchange of information about an interaction between an individual and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of an individual.

tags.name: Patient
tags.description:
Demographics and other administrative information about an individual or animal receiving care or other health-related services.

 Tracking patient is the center of the healthcare process.

 Profile (constraints): [UKCore-Patient](https://simplifier.net/guide/HL7FHIRUKCoreR4Release1/Home/ProfilesandExtensions/ProfileUKCore-Patient)

 Defines the UK Core constraints and extensions on the Patient resource for the minimal set of data to query and retrieve an individualâ€™s demographic information.

 This profile allows exchange of demographics and other administrative information about an individual receiving care or other health-related services.

get.description:
[search](http://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html) for Appointment instances.

Get Bookings for a patient

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description:
One of the individuals of the appointment is this patient

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)|  Appointment.participant.actor.where(resolve() is Patient) |

parameters.name: patient:identifier
parameters.description:
Search for appointment for a patient by NHS Number

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  Appointment.participant.actor.identifier |

parameters.name: date
parameters.description:
Appointment date/time.

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [date/datetime ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#date/datetime)|  Appointment.start |

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
An [OAuth 2.0 bearer token](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/guides-and-documentation/security-and-authorisation#user-restricted-apis).

Required in all environments except sandbox.

parameters.name: NHSD-Session-URID
parameters.description: The user role ID (URID) for the current session. Also known as a user role profile ID (URPID).

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A globally unique identifier (GUID) for the request, which we use to de-duplicate repeated requests and to trace the request if you contact our helpdesk

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: An optional ID which you can use to track transactions across multiple systems. It can have any value, but we recommend avoiding `.` characters.

parameters.name: patient
parameters.description:
Search Encounters by NHS Number

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [reference ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#reference)|   Encounter.subject.where(resolve() is Patient) |

 | [date/datetime ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#date/datetime)|   Encounter.period |
